div.h1: Status report for the Apache ActiveMQ Project

structured-macro.plain-text-body:
Community: * The ActiveMQ project has had another very busy quarter. Jonathan Anstey was voted in as an ActiveMQ committer. * The development and user lists continue to stay vibrant.
Development: * Lots of development effort continues around pushing out new versions of ActiveMQ, ActiveMQ-CPP, and Camel. A new 5.2.0 release of ActiveMQ is currently in the works.
Releases: * ActiveMQ-CPP 2.2.1 * Camel 1.4.0
